fields.name: MP5-SD6
fields.description: Tokyo Marui MP-SD Next Generation Recoil Shock Electric Airsoft Rifle

fields.name: AKX Gas Blowback Rifle
fields.description: The Tokyo Marui AKX Gas Blowback Airsoft Rifle is a modernized version of the iconic AK47, renowned for its power, reliability, and affordability. Designed with a short barrel, folding stock, and M-Lok handguard, it suits various playstyles. Fueled by gas, it delivers authentic blowback action, while its adjustable hop-up enhances range and accuracy. Crafted with metal components, it ensures durability. The rifle includes a 35-round magazine, compatible with other Tokyo Marui AKM magazines. Its versatility extends to aftermarket accessories, allowing customization. For airsoft enthusiasts seeking realism and adaptability, the Tokyo Marui AKX is a top-tier choice.
